name: JPCDI Repo
description: The official JPCDI Repo for Kasm.

workspaces.description: This Ubuntu Desktop specifically includes the Tor Browser, VLC and other miscellaneous tools
workspaces.name: ghcr.io/jpartain89/kasm-ubuntu-desktop-vlc-tor:main

first_launch.cmd: bash -c 'ip route delete default && ip route add default via 172.20.0.2'

workspaces.friendly_name: Ubuntu Desktop with VLC and Tor, relying on a VPN Sidecar.
